original_title: Christmas Cartoon Fireplace: A Yule Log of Fun!
overview: A fun and festive way to dress up your TV for the holidays! Watch over 140 minutes of your favorite classic Christmas cartoons play next to a relaxing roaring fire! Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer, Snow Foolin, The Christmas Tree, Spunky The Snowman, Christmas Visitor, Jack Frost, Santa's Surprise, O Little Town of Bethlehem, Frosty The Snowman, Jingle Bells, The First Christmas, and many more!
title: Christmas Cartoon Fireplace: A Yule Log of Fun!
